title: Zhang Huikang
text: Zhang Huikang (born 22 July 1962) is a Chinese <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">Goalkeeper</a> who played for <a href="China%20national%20football%20team">China</a> in the <a href="1988%20Asian%20Cup">1988 Asian Cup</a>. He also played for <a href="Shanghai">Shanghai</a> city team and <a href="South%20China%20AA">South China</a> in Hong Kong.
